name: Greek-style Burgers
description: A Mediterranean twist on burgers - ready in just 30 minutes!

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Bruschetta Seasoning

preparation: Whisk first 6 ingredients in a stainless steel mixing bowl.
Add ground beef, breadcrumbs and feta, mixing gently to combine.
With water moistened hands, form mixture into 4 — 3⁄4" patties.
Grill over medium-high heat with lid closed for 4 minutes each side, or until an instant-read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 160° F (70° C).
tips: Serve in pitas or hamburger buns with lettuce, tomatoes and prepared Epicure Tzatziki Dip.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Bruschetta Seasoning
summary: An aromatic blend of basil, garlic and parsley.

products.name: Sea Salt (Grinder)
summary: Crisp, clean salt from the sea.
